column1: I'm feeling excited about this new project!
Work has been stressful and I'm feeling overwhelmed.
Today was a great day and I'm happy about my progress.
I had a wonderful conversation with my team and feel grateful.
I'm anxious about the presentation tomorrow.
The weekend was relaxing and I feel content.
I feel exhausted by all the tasks on my plate.
My mentor gave me great feedback and I'm confident now.
I'm grateful for the support from my colleagues.
I'm struggling to find work-life balance and feel frustrated.
I'm sad about missing the team event.
I feel nervous about the upcoming deadline.
I'm thrilled about the new opportunity ahead.
I'm worried about the project timeline.
I feel cheerful after the successful meeting.
